Your Cookie Settings

Analytics cookies are off for visitors from the UK or EEA unless they click Accept or submit a form on nginx.com. They’re on by default for everybody else. Follow the instructions here to deactivate analytics cookies. This deactivation will work even if you later click Accept or submit a form.

Check this box so we and our advertising and social media partners can use cookies on nginx.com to better tailor ads to your interests. Uncheck it to withdraw consent.

Cookie preferences

Accept cookies for analytics, social media, and advertising, or learn more and adjust your preferences. These cookies are on by default for visitors outside the UK and EEA. Privacy Notice.

Custom API Gateways

Deliver Modern applications at Scale with NGINX Products

NGINX Open Source

The open source web server that powers more than 400 million websites
  • Current version: 1.19.8
  • Documentation

NGINX Plus

The only all‑in‑one load balancer, web server, content cache, and API gateway
  • Current version: R23
  • Documentation

NGINX Controller

Centralized monitoring and management for NGINX Plus
  • Current version: 3.12.0
  • Documentation

NGINX App Protect

Modern app security powered by F5 WAF technology running on NGINX Plus
  • Current version: 2.2
  • Documentation

NGINX Unit

Multi‑language application server from NGINX
  • Current version: 1.23.0
  • Documentation

NGINX Amplify

Lightweight, cloud-based monitoring for NGINX and NGINX Plus
  • Current version: 1.01
  • Documentation

Trusted by More of the World’s Busiest Sites than Any Other Server

  • Events
  • Scott De Buitléir of F5 • March 24, 2021

F5 Agility 2021 takes the virtual stage on April 20–22 this year, and the NGINX team will be there in full force. Don't miss our sessions and demos on production-grade Kubernetes, real-time API management, and synergies between F5 and NGINX products.

NGINX App Protect Brings Security to the API Ecosystem

  • Opinion
  • Scott Laster of F5 • March 17, 2021

A “security as code” approach centered around NGINX App Protect is key to protecting your APIs. Integrate non‑disruptive security controls into your automation and CI/CD processes so that app security is baked in from the outset, not bolted on as an afterthought.

Introducing NGINX Instance Manager – A Tool to Track,...

  • Tech, News
  • Karthik Krishnaswamy of F5 • March 16, 2021

The more ways you leverage the power of NGINX, the more of challenge it can be to track and manage the NGINX Open Source and NGINX Plus instances across your infrastructure. Introducing NGINX Instance Manager, one tool for tracking, configuring, and monitoring NGINX at scale.
